seed_pair.target: Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.
seed_pair.known: He's trying to tell me what he wants

S0212: They wanted to ask for help.
S0213: No sabemos qué están intentando lograr.
We don't know what they're trying to achieve.
S0214: ¿Pasaste un buen tiempo el fin de semana?
Did you have a good time at the weekend?
S0215: Salí el sábado por la noche.
I went out on Saturday night.
S0217: Tuve un vaso o dos de agua.
I had a glass or two of water.
S0218: I didn't do much on Sunday.
S0219: Fue agradable relajarse por un rato.
It was nice to relax for a while.
S0220: Did you watch a bit of television?
S0221: Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.
I watched the football and then I watched a film.
